cv.title: Resume
cv.description: An interactive resume of Stanislav Kosorin, outlining his education, work experience, and skills

content.title: MSc Computer Science @ Technische Universit√§t Berlin
content.description: Currently pursuing a Master's degree with a focus on distributed systems and networking.
content.details: Topics include distributed systems, computer networks, cloud computing and security.

content.title: Full Stack Software Engineer @ Cresta
content.description: As a full stack software engineer, my primary responsibilities involve designing and implementing new features for our frontend web application using React with TypeScript, writing backend services in Go and working with gRPC for communication between microservices.
content.details: I also gained a solid understanding of cloud technologies, particularly AWS, and have experience with infrastructure as code using Terraform.

content.title: Computer Vision Engineer @ PTX tech GmbH
content.description: At PTX, I contributed to the development of a cutting-edge, real-time 3D detection system that leveraged advanced computer vision algorithms. The languages and technologies used were C++, Qt5 and CUDA.
content.details: Specifically, I designed an efficient, multi-threaded pipeline in C++ (Qt5 framework) to process 3D point clouds effectively. I also integrated a GPU-accelerated Simultaneous Localization and Mapping (SLAM) algorithm into the system. This successful integration resulted in a 10x speedup in processing time, greatly enhancing the overall performance of our 3D detection system.

content.title: BSc Computer Science @ Technische Universit√§t Berlin
content.description: Gained a strong foundation in programming, algorithms, and software development, with a focus on solving complex problems and collaborating effectively in team environments. This education has prepared me to contribute meaningfully to technology-driven projects.
content.details: In my thesis, I explored the feasibility of proactive container migration on a simulated low-Earth (LEO) orbit edge environment. The entire thesis and source code are available on my GitHub.

content.title: High School @ Gymn√°zium Ladislava S√°ru, Bratislava
content.description: I attended a general education gymnasium, with a focus on languages (german in my case). I graduated with a 1.0 (best possible) grade on my final report, in the focus subjects mathematics, informatics, english and slovak language.
content.details: In addition to forming some great memories, I acquired a strong foundation in natural sciences as well as an introduction to programming. I also learned German and achieved a C1 language certificate, enabling me to pursue further studies in Germany.
